entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 near midnight then north 30 gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
